required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Non-interventional Study on Patients With Atrial Fibrillation and Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter, Non-interventional Study on Patients With Atrial Fibrillation (AF) and Cancer (Diagnosed Within the Last 3 Years Prior to Enrolment)

brief_summary.textblock:
AF and cancer frequently coexist. Since these patients are usually excluded from randomized trials, information on their management and outcome is scarce. Occurrence of relevant clinical events, such as ischemic and hemorrhagic and all-cause mortality and cardiovascular (CV) mortality occurring in patients treated or not with antithrombotic agents needs to be clarified.
A prospective observational registry collecting information, in a real world setting, on the clinical profile of patients with these clinical conditions and on the use of antithrombotic drugs in patients with AF and cancer could improve our knowledge on the management of these high risk patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
International, multicenter, non-interventional study on patients with atrial fibrillation (AF) and cancer (diagnosed within the last 3 years prior to enrolment).
The study will be conducted in about 80 sites in italy and 50 sites distributed in other European countries (Belgium, Germany, Ireland, Portugal, Spain, The Netherlands, Turkey).
The study will continue till the consecutive recruitment of 1500 patients. The recruitment period will last approximately 24 months.
Number of visits per patient: Baseline and 1 year (Final). Physicians will not be required to perform any additional tests, assessments, etc., not in line with their routine medical practice.

primary_outcome.measure: Patients with AF and cancer treated with oral anticoagulant therapy and with other antithrombotic therapy
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with AF and cancer treated with oral anticoagulant therapy and with other antithrombotic therapy

primary_outcome.measure: Patients with AF and cancer treated with oral anticoagulant therapy and with other antithrombotic therapy
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with AF and cancer treated with oral anticoagulant therapy and with other antithrombotic therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing all cause stroke
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing all cause stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing transient ischemic attacks
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing transient ischemic attacks

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing major adverse cardiovascular events (non fatal MI, non fatal stroke, non fatal systemic embolic events, cardiovascular death)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing major adverse cardiovascular events (non fatal MI, non fatal stroke, non fatal systemic embolic events, cardiovascular death)

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing systemic embolic events
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing systemic embolic events

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing acute coronary syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing acute coronary syndrome

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing venous thromboembolic events, defined as composite of deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing venous thromboembolic events, defined as composite of deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing deep vein thrombosis
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing deep vein thrombosis

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing pulmonary embolism
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing pulmonary embolism

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing major bleeding (Fatal bleeding, Non-fatal bleeding,Intracranial hemorrhage
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing major bleeding (Fatal bleeding, Non-fatal bleeding,Intracranial hemorrhage

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing clinically relevant non-major bleeding
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing clinically relevant non-major bleeding

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing composite of major and CRNM bleeding
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing composite of major and CRNM bleeding

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing all-cause death
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing all-cause death

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing cardiovascular death
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing cardiovascular death

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing death due to malignancy
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing death due to malignancy

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing sudden and unexplained death
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients treated with oral anticoagulant therapy, other antithrombotic therapy or not treated experiencing sudden and unexplained death

secondary_outcome.measure: Association of various antithrombotic treatments (or lack of) on hospital admissions due to CV or non CV causes
secondary_outcome.description: Number of hospital admissions (defined as ≥ 24 h stay in a hospital) due to CV or non CV causes

secondary_outcome.measure: Association of various antithrombotic treatments (or lack of) on hospital admissions due to CV or non CV causes
secondary_outcome.description: Length of hospital admissions (defined as ≥ 24 h stay in a hospital) due to CV or non CV causes;
Treatment satisfaction as assessed by the Perception Anticoagulant Treatment Questionnaire (PACT-Q)
Health related quality of life as assessed by the EuroQol (EQ-5D-5L) questionnaire

study_pop.textblock: Patient with diagnosed AF (any type of AF, electrocardiographically documented within 1 year prior to enrolment) and with a documented cancer (diagnosed within the last 3 years prior to enrolment into this registry), including melanoma but not other basal-cell or squamous-cell carcinoma of the skin. The diagnosis/history of cancer must be objectively documented.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Both sexes
- Age >18 years
- Patient with diagnosed AF (any type of AF, electrocardiographically documented within 1 year prior to enrolment)
- Patient with a documented cancer (diagnosed within the last 3 years prior to enrolment into this registry), including melanoma but not other basal-cell or squamous-cell carcinoma of the skin. The diagnosis/history of cancer must be objectively documented.
- Written informed consent (IC) for participation in the study
- Patient not simultaneously participating in any interventional study.
Exclusion Criteria:
-
